patthana16.4:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca
patthana16.4:1.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato
patthana16.4:1.1_2: nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca
patthana16.4:1.1_3: dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naabyākato nahetu ceva naahetuko
patthana16.4:2.1: Akusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.4:3.1_0: Abyākataṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca
patthana16.4:3.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo
patthana16.4:3.1_2: nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca
patthana16.4:3.1_3: dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko
patthana16.4:4.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana16.4:5.1_0: Kusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu
patthana16.4:5.1_1: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana16.4:5.1_2: naabyākato naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ sahetukañceva
patthana16.4:5.1_3: na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca naabyākato naahetuko
patthana16.4:5.1_4: ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.4:6.1_0: Akusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu
patthana16.4:6.1_1: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana16.4:6.1_2: naabyākato naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ sahetukañceva
patthana16.4:6.1_3: na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca naabyākato naahetuko
patthana16.4:6.1_4: ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.4:7.1_0: Abyākataṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu
patthana16.4:7.1_1: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana16.4:7.1_2: naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ sahetukañceva
patthana16.4:7.1_3: na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca naakusalo naahetuko
patthana16.4:7.1_4: ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.4:8.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
